resources.string:
Dear Guest,
welcome to the Application "Svoya Igra" by El_Diablo. It would help you to play the Game with YOUR packages. To start the game press "New game" and select your package in file system of your gadget. To move between questions use "<-" and "->" buttons. If you want to check your answer, press show answer.
 I hope, you would enjoy playing the game.
 Yours sincerely.
 Maksimus_El_Diablo

 P.S. With any questions and bugs mail to megamax143.13@gmail.com with header "Svoya Igra".
